A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was straight garbage. I mean dumpster fire garbage. No that's too nice. I mean drop a deuce in a trash bag that I just threw up in and put that in a burning dumpster full of dead rats garbage. More plot holes than my spaghetti strainer\, and big ones too. No respect for the past and no development for the future. It was a 2:30 minute slow motion chase scene that ended in still chasing. The disrespect to the fans and to Luke is astounding. Idk what else to say. I added an account just to get this off my chest.
